name: BMW i7
description: The price of BMW i7, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 2.03  - 2.50 Crore. It is available in 3 variants and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. i7 comes with 7 airbags. BMW i7 is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a driving range of 596 Km for i7.

variants.variant_name: JUST LAUNCHED JUST LAUNCHED i7 eDrive50 M Sport 101.7 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 603 Km
i7 xDrive60 M Sport 101.7 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 625 Km
i7 M70 xDrive 101.7 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 560 Km
